Rasters of Land Use and Land Cover of the São Lourenço River Basin (2002 - 2014)

Source: R/data.R
SaoLourencoBasin.Rd

A multi-layer raster (RasterStack) with five (5) RasterLayer objects represinting the years 2002, 2008, 2010, 2012 and 2014 respectively. These Raster* have everyone 11 classes of use, these classes are:

Pixel ValueLegendClassUseDetails
2ApAnthropicAnthropic UsePastagem
3FFNaturalNAFormações Florestais
4SANaturalNASavana Arborizada (SA - Cerrado)
5SGNaturalNASavana Gramínea (SG - Campo)
7aaAnthropicNAAlteração Antrópica
8SFNaturalNASavana Florestada (SF - Cerradão)
9AguaNaturalNARios, córregos, corixos, vazantes, baías e salinas
10IuAnthropicAnthropic UseInfluencia Urbana
11AcAnthropicAnthropic UseAgricultura
12RAnthropicAnthropic UseReflorestamento
13ImAnthropicAnthropic UseDegradação por Mineração
data(SaoLourencoBasin)

Format

An object of class "RasterBrick" with 5 layers:

  • landscape_2002: Land scape of the land use and land cover for the yeear 2002

  • landscape_2008: Land scape of the land use and land cover for the yeear 2008

  • landscape_2010: Land scape of the land use and land cover for the yeear 2010

  • landscape_2012: Land scape of the land use and land cover for the yeear 2012

  • landscape_2014: Land scape of the land use and land cover for the yeear 2014

Source

https://www.embrapa.br/pantanal/bacia-do-alto-paraguai

References

Instituto SOS Pantanal and WWF-Brasil (2015) (Monitoramento das alterações da cobertura vegetal e uso do Solo na Bacia do Alto Paraguai – Porção Brasileira – Período de Análise: 2012 a 2014. 4th edn. Brasilia.)

Examples

data(SaoLourencoBasin)
raster::plot(SaoLourencoBasin[[1]])
#> Error in .local(.Object, ...):
